title: Phil Robertson Fooled the FBI Without Saying a Word
description:
Phil Robertson hits the duck call room to reveal a talent even he didn't know he had: beating the FBI's lie detection technology in the coolest way possible. Phil and Si admit to their childhood poaching strategies and share the one rule they wouldn't break. They also reminisce about how Phil lured Si away from his dead-end job to be his reed man. Godwin remembers the early days of Duck Commander and the exact date and time he was converted. Phil divulges how he played matchmaker for his granddaughter and Stone in the duck blind. And John-David clams up so he can hear more from master storytellers Phil and Si.
-
